dict.string:
Styles the viewer window to look like a web browser when the composition is running. Click the downloads button to stop the viewer. The back and forward buttons are accessible through the Browser Buttons patch.
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
Use of this patch is subject to the license found at http://origami.facebook.com/license/
Copyright: (c) 2014, Facebook, Inc. All rights reserved.
Created by: Brandon Walkin, Drew Hamlin
The title of the viewer window
The URL in the address bar
A 16 px icon next to the URL
Controls whether the back button looks enabled and is clickable
Controls whether the forward button looks enabled and is clickable
